Dear all,

I am just trying to understand...

The proposal is to apply GNG =
to define the hidden node structure in a
hyperneat substrate?
One CPPN (4D)=
 is still used for the weights and another CPPN (2D) is
used as input for t=
he GNG algorithm to evolve the hidden nodes in the
network?

Best regards,
